mainDescription.subtitle: FRONTEND WEB DEVELOPER
mainDescription.name: Hello, I'm Antonio Delage, contact me to create
mainDescription.title: Your web application with best technologies.

item1.description: - Creation of the sustainability page for HSBC UK bank. Development of the application with ReactJS. ReactJS uses React Hooks, React Query, React Redux, React Router and React DOM. Layout with SASS and HTML5 with the FIGMA tool, Workflow and workload using SCRUM methodology. Use of API Fetch and REST. Version control using GIT and Bitbucket.

item2.description: -Modification of the Madre Coraje association project, where pages are added/modified and an interactive map is created, all created with ReactJS. React Hooks, Leaflet and NodeJS are used. Layout with CSS and HTML5 with FIGMA tool, workflow and workload using KANVAN methodology. Version control with Git and Github.

item3.description: -Ticket resolution on the Covid website of the German Government. Solving JavaScript tickets, layout with HTML5 and CSS3 on new and existing pages. Version control with GIT.

about.title: About me
about.item1: -Professional web application development specialized in the frontend with the React JS library.
about.item2: -Currently I am working on the development of web applications with React JS and Node JS.
about.item3: -I have knowledge in the development of web applications with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React JS, Node JS, Express JS, MongoDB, MySQL, PHP, Laravel, WordPress, Bootstrap, Materialize, Material UI, Tailwind CSS, Git, GitHub, GitLab , GitKraken, Visual Studio Code, Adobe XD, Figma, Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, Premiere Pro, After Effects, Audition, Lightroom, among others.
